Nobel Laureates at Project Gutenberg

The Nobel Prize for Literature was first awarded in 1901 to Sully Prudhomme. Since that year it has been awarded every year, other than on six occasions during the First and second World Wars. The list of laureates may be viewed at the official Nobel Site.

Nobel Prize winners represented at Project Gutenberg include the following. Click on the name to view the list of titles available.

Year ---------- Winner ----------

1903 Bjornstjerne BJORNSON (1832-1910)

1905 Henryk SIENKIEWICZ (1846-1916)

1907 Rudyard KIPLING (1865-1936)

1909 Selma LAGERLOF (1858-1940)

1910 Paul HEYSE (1830-1914)

1911 Maurice MAETERLINCK (1862-1949)

1913 Rabindranath TAGORE (1861-1941)

1917 Karl Adolph Gjellerup (1857-1919)

1917 Henrik Pontoppidan (1857-1943)

1920 Knut Hamsun (1859-1952)

1921 Anatole FRANCE (1844-1924)

1923 William Butler YEATS (1865-1939) (also at Project Gutenberg Australia )

1925 George Bernard SHAW (1856-1950) (also at Project Gutenberg Australia )

1927 Henri BERGSON (1859-1941)

1930 Sinclair LEWIS (1885-1951) (also at Project Gutenberg Australia )

1932 John GALSWORTHY (1867-1933) (also at Project Gutenberg Australia )

1934 Luigi PIRANDELLO (1867-1936) (also at Project Gutenberg Australia )

1944 Johannes Vilhelm JENSEN (1873-1950)

1936 Eugene O'NEILL (1888-1953)

1946 Hermann HESSE (1877-1962)

1948 T S (Thomas Stearns) ELIOT (1888-1965)

1950 Bertrand RUSSELL (1872-1970)

1953 Winston CHURCHILL (1874-1965)

Updated 1 April 2016
